item.title: Disney - It's A Small World
item.description:
It’s a world
of laughter a world
Of tears
It’s a world of
Hopes and a
world of fears
There’s so much
that we share
That it’s time
we’re aware
It’s a small world
after all
It’s a small world
after all
It’s a small world
after all
It’s a small world
after all
It’s a small
small world

There is just one moon
and one golden sun
And a smile
means friendship
To every one
though the mountains
Divide and
the oceans are wide
It’s a small world
after all
It’s a small world
after all
It’s a small world
after all
It’s a small world
after all
It’s a small
small world
It’s a world
of laughter
A world of tears
it’s a world of hopes
And a world of fears
there’s so much that
We share that
it’s time
We’re aware
It’s a small world
A small world
after all
